main event: A white flash was observed making a sharp maneuver while three aircraft were in the area.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 minutes,The object made a rapid braking maneuver in the sky,Three aircraft were reported to be in the vicinity during the sighting,The sighting was noted at 1900 EDT on August 21, 1957,The sighting was recorded in Project Blue Book as part of documentation.
sighted object: a white flash in the sky
